original: no raktaṃ na ca naitadātma tadidaṃ netraṃ jayatyaiśvaram	|| 2 ||
analyzed: no raktam na ca na etat ātma tat idam netram jayati aiśvaram
iti śrī netratantre śrī mahā māheśvara ācārya varya śrī kṣemarāja viracita
tvattaḥ naiśatamaḥ praśāmyati jagat jāta prabodham sadā

original: sāphalyaṃ dadhate dṛśaḥ sadasatī samyag vyavasthāpite |
analyzed: sāphalyam dadhate dṛśaḥ sat asatī samyak vyavasthāpite
yat tvam sūkara ghūka carma caṭaka prāyaiḥ tu naḥ manyase

original: bhāsvaddyota sa doṣa eṣa viṣamasteṣāṃ dṛśastādṛśaḥ || 1 ||
analyzed: bhāsvat dyota sa doṣaḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ teṣām dṛśaḥ tādṛśaḥ
śrī rāma ādi guru grāmaḥ tathā antevāsinā upare
bhaṭṭa raktika garbha īśa keśava ādyāḥ iha arthanām
akārṣuḥ me tatas kiṃcid idam udyotitam mayā
para advaita amṛta sphītaḥ netra udyotaḥ yam utthitaḥ
abhinava guru vāṇī sat madhūnām su pūrṇām
pariṇatim asamām svām kṣemarājaḥ vimṛśya
vikasita sumanaḥ śrī śrīmat ucca utpala antar
parimala sarasānām vyākarot śāstram etat
grastaḥ yam sakalaḥ bhavaḥ vigalitāḥ karma aṇu māyā amalāḥ

original: prāptānandaghanā sthitiḥ kimaparaṃ labdhaḥ prakāśaḥ paraḥ |
analyzed: prāpta ānanda ghanā sthitiḥ kim aparam labdhaḥ prakāśaḥ paraḥ
asmābhiḥ vimale hṛd ambara tale niryantraṇam
yat tat prāhuḥ prathayat akhilam vartanīm saṃvidhatte
yat ca ullekhāt vilikhat akhilam sūtra saṃsthāḥ karoti
netra dvandvam tat iha kalayat śāṅkaram tat cit ātma
jyotiḥ netram jayati parama ānanda pūrṇam tṛtīyam
a samāptā iyam netra uddyota ākhyaḥ granthaḥ
tad para śrī kṣemarājasya iti śivam
